## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (d29aaa8c56838993a54df9b7ee45362f439f4b704ca467383c14f4643e2151a9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@metronetinc/react-component-library-next-plugin' @ 9.999.8 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
